mapper.select: SELECT GREG.GEN_REG_ID AS GEN_REG_ID, SWOR.REGION_ID AS REGION_ID, REGIONS.NAME AS NAME FROM SIT_REG SREG, SIT_BACKUP SBAC, SIT_CHK SCHK, GEN_REG GREG, WORK_REGION_PREFERED SWOR, REGIONS WHERE SREG.SIT_BACKUP_ID = SBAC.SIT_BACKUP_ID AND SBAC.SIT_BACKUP_ID = SCHK.SIT_BACKUP_ID AND SBAC.SIT_BACKUP_ID = GREG.SIT_BACKUP_ID AND GREG.GEN_REG_ID = SWOR.GEN_REG_ID AND SWOR.REGION_ID = REGIONS.REGION_ID(+) AND GREG.GEN_REG_ID = #{gen_reg_id}
